$description: Component color tokens for CCUI 3.0 light theme. Maps semantic color tokens to Mantine component variants, enabling theme-aware styling.

button.$description: Button component colors organized by CSS property (bg, text, border) and Mantine variant (filled, outline, light, subtle, default).

default.$description: Mantine Button variant='filled' background. Pair with button.text.filled for WCAG AA contrast.

hover.$description: Mantine Button variant='filled' hover background. Applied on :hover state.
Mantine Button variant='outline' hover background. Outline buttons have transparent default bg.

default.$description: Mantine Button variant='light' background. Tinted brand color. Pair with button.text.light.
Mantine Button variant='subtle' background. Transparent at rest, shows bg only on hover.

hover.$description: Mantine Button variant='subtle' hover background. Uses light tint for hover feedback.

default.$description: Mantine Button variant='default' background. Neutral surface color with visible border.

disabled.$description: Disabled button background. Shared across all variants. Pair with button.text.disabled.

filled.$description: Mantine Button variant='filled' text color. High contrast on filled bg (white on brand).

outline.$description: Mantine Button variant='outline' text color. Brand-colored text on transparent/surface bg.

light.$description: Mantine Button variant='light' text color. Readable on light tinted bg.

subtle.$description: Mantine Button variant='subtle' text color. Brand-colored text on transparent bg.

default.$description: Mantine Button variant='default' text color. Neutral text on surface bg.

disabled.$description: Disabled button text color. Shared across all variants. Pair with button.bg.disabled.

outline.$description: Mantine Button variant='outline' border color. Brand-colored border on transparent bg.

default.$description: Mantine Button variant='default' border color. Neutral border.

disabled.$description: Disabled button border color. Shared across all variants.

danger.$description: Danger button tokens for destructive actions (delete, remove, revoke).

default.$description: Danger Button variant='filled' background. Pair with button.danger.text.filled for WCAG AA contrast.
Danger Button variant='light' background. Tinted red. Pair with button.danger.text.light.
Danger Button variant='subtle' background. Transparent at rest.

filled.$description: Danger Button variant='filled' text color. White on red bg.

outline.$description: Danger Button variant='outline' text color. Red text on transparent bg.

light.$description: Danger Button variant='light' text color. Readable on light red bg.

subtle.$description: Danger Button variant='subtle' text color. Red text on transparent bg.

outline.$description: Danger Button variant='outline' border color. Red border on transparent bg.

input.$description: Input component colors. Applies to TextInput, NumberInput, Textarea, PasswordInput, and other Mantine input components.

default.$description: Default input background. Maps to Mantine input styles.input backgroundColor.

disabled.$description: Disabled input background. Pair with input.text.disabled and input.border.disabled.

default.$description: Input text color. Used for user-entered text content.

placeholder.$description: Input placeholder text color. Lower contrast than default text. Do not rely on for essential information.

error.$description: Input error message text color. Used for validation error text below the input.

disabled.$description: Disabled input text color. Pair with input.bg.disabled.

default.$description: Default input border color. Applied in rest state.

focus.$description: Focused input border color. Applied on :focus. Input uses the standard outline-based focus ring pattern via color.focus.ring.

error.$description: Error state input border color. Applied when input has validation errors.

alert.$description: Alert component colors. Maps to Mantine Alert with color prop variants (blue, green, yellow, red).

info.$description: Info alert background. Mantine Alert color='blue'. Pair with alert.text.info and alert.border.info.

success.$description: Success alert background. Mantine Alert color='green'. Pair with alert.text.success.

warning.$description: Warning alert background. Mantine Alert color='yellow'. Pair with alert.text.warning.

error.$description: Error alert background. Mantine Alert color='red'. Pair with alert.text.error.

info.$description: Info alert text color. WCAG AA contrast on alert.bg.info.

warning.$description: Warning alert text color. Uses darker shade for contrast on yellow bg.

badge.$description: badge — Badge component colors. Maps to Mantine Badge variant prop (filled, light, outline) and status-based color variants (info, success, warning, error) for status indicator badges.

filled.$description: badge.bg.filled — Mantine Badge variant='filled' background. Pair with badge.text.filled.

light.$description: badge.bg.light — Mantine Badge variant='light' background. Pair with badge.text.light.

info.$description: badge.bg.info — Info status badge background. Use for informational indicators, counts, and neutral status. Pair with badge.text.info.

success.$description: badge.bg.success — Success status badge background. Use for active, complete, approved, or healthy status. Pair with badge.text.success.

warning.$description: badge.bg.warning — Warning status badge background. Use for pending, at-risk, or attention-needed status. Pair with badge.text.warning.

error.$description: badge.bg.error — Error status badge background. Use for failed, rejected, critical, or expired status. Pair with badge.text.error.

filled.$description: badge.text.filled — Mantine Badge variant='filled' text color. High contrast on filled bg.

light.$description: badge.text.light — Mantine Badge variant='light' text color.

outline.$description: badge.text.outline — Mantine Badge variant='outline' text color. Brand-colored on transparent bg.

info.$description: badge.text.info — Info status badge text color. WCAG AA contrast on badge.bg.info.

success.$description: badge.text.success — Success status badge text color. WCAG AA contrast on badge.bg.success.

warning.$description: badge.text.warning — Warning status badge text color. Uses darker shade for contrast on yellow bg.

error.$description: badge.text.error — Error status badge text color. WCAG AA contrast on badge.bg.error.

outline.$description: badge.border.outline — Mantine Badge variant='outline' border color.

info.$description: badge.border.info — Info status badge border color.

success.$description: badge.border.success — Success status badge border color.

warning.$description: badge.border.warning — Warning status badge border color.

error.$description: badge.border.error — Error status badge border color.

card.$description: Card component colors. Maps to Mantine Card and Paper components.

bg.$description: Card background color. Maps to Mantine Card/Paper backgroundColor.

border.$description: Card border color. Applied when Mantine Card withBorder prop is set.

checkbox.$description: Checkbox component colors. Maps to Mantine Checkbox checked/unchecked/disabled states.

unchecked.$description: Unchecked checkbox background. Empty state surface color.

checked.$description: Checked checkbox background. Brand-colored fill. Pair with checkbox.icon.checked for checkmark contrast.

disabled.$description: Disabled checkbox background. Applies to both checked and unchecked disabled states.

unchecked.$description: Unchecked checkbox border. Visible boundary in empty state.

checked.$description: Checked checkbox border. Matches checked bg for seamless filled appearance.
Checkmark icon color. High contrast on checkbox.bg.checked (white on brand).

disabled.$description: Disabled checkbox icon color. Muted checkmark for disabled checked state.

switch.$description: Switch/toggle component colors. Maps to Mantine Switch on/off/disabled states.

off.$description: Switch track color when off. Neutral muted background.

on.$description: Switch track color when on. Brand-colored to indicate active state.

off.$description: Switch thumb color when off. Contrasts against track.off.

on.$description: Switch thumb color when on. Contrasts against track.on.

select.$description: Select/dropdown component colors. Maps to Mantine Select and Combobox components.

bg.$description: Dropdown menu background. The floating panel that contains options.

hover.$description: Option hover background. Applied on keyboard/mouse focus within dropdown.

selected.$description: Selected option background. Brand-tinted to indicate current selection. Pair with select.option.text.selected.
Selected option text color. Brand-colored on light bg.

modal.$description: Modal/dialog component colors. Maps to Mantine Modal component.

overlay.$description: Modal overlay/backdrop color. Semi-transparent layer behind modal.

header.$description: Modal header bottom border. Separates header from body content.

footer.$description: Modal footer top border. Separates body content from footer actions.

table.$description: Table component colors. Maps to Mantine Table props: striped, highlightOnHover, withTableBorder.

header.$description: Table header row background. Differentiates thead from tbody.

striped.$description: Alternating row background. Applied when Mantine Table striped prop is set.

hover.$description: Row hover background. Applied when highlightOnHover prop is set.

selected.$description: Selected row background. Brand-tinted to indicate selection state.

border.$description: Table border color. Applied to cell borders and outer table border.

tabs.$description: Tabs component colors. Maps to Mantine Tabs component with default variant.

active.$description: Active tab indicator color. The underline/border marking the active tab.

default.$description: Inactive tab text color. De-emphasized to distinguish from active tab.

hover.$description: Tab hover text color. Increases emphasis on hover.

active.$description: Active tab text color. Brand-colored to match indicator.

border.$description: Tab list border color. The line running along the tab list.

radio.$description: Radio component colors. Maps to Mantine Radio selected/unselected/disabled states. Mirrors checkbox color pattern.

checked.$description: Selected radio border. Matches checked bg.
Inner dot color when selected. High contrast on radio.bg.checked.

avatar.$description: Avatar component colors. Maps to Mantine Avatar placeholder and status states.

placeholder.$description: Default avatar placeholder background when no image is provided.
Initials text color on placeholder background.

bg.$description: Tooltip background. Dark bg for contrast against light page.

text.$description: Tooltip text color. White on dark bg for readability.

border.$description: Tooltip border color. Matches bg for seamless appearance.

text.$description: Label text inside progress fill. White on brand bg.

active.$description: Active page text color. White on brand bg.

highlight.$description: Skeleton animation highlight color. Slightly lighter for shimmer effect.
